text:
Tom D’Agostino isn’t having a lot of luck when it comes to managing to get away from drama. Following the divorce from his ex-wife, Luann De Lesseps, the Real Housewives Of New York City alum has found himself at the front of headlines once again.

In a report from Page Six, the publication claims the police are investigating him after a confrontation inside of a restaurant in Palm Beach.

However, another source stated neither Tom or his lawyers have spoken to police about such an inquiry. The source claimed, “there were a lot of people who saw what happened,” and the man who got into a fight with him is known around the town.

The perpetrator allegedly put his hands on Tom’s girlfriend, and after he got involved, there were drinks thrown at each other. The insider claims him, and his girlfriend left Cucina – the restaurant they were eating at – without problems or confrontations with the police.

The insider alleged that the reality star said he only regrets spilling his martini. It was a matter of protecting his girlfriend, so there’s no remorse.

As most fans know, Palm Beach is a special place in the heart of Tom and Luann. It’s the place where they got married during a New Years Eve party, an extravagant one at that.

Unfortunately, Luann and Tom separated just seven months later, and since then, Lesseps has found herself in serious trouble with the law. Celebrity Insider reported last year that Luann fought the police during a drunken endeavor on Christmas Eve morning.

Advertisement

As for their relationship, Tom said to E! News they “fell in love,” but it ended quickly, and he was “sad” that two people who loved each other are not an item anymore. He stated the stories perpetrated by the media make for good headlines and wishes Lesseps a happy future filled with love.
title: Luann De Lessep’s Ex-Husband Tom D’Agostino Not Under Investigation By Police Despite Reports
